author: nishant0
content: It is definitely not a big window, we already have a lot of attestations floating about in the network along with a lot of blocks being propagated at the 4s boundary. It doesn't give us a lot of time to aggregate all these attestations. Now if you further decouple this, verifying attestations require now both the block + attestation data instead of just the block now. You tradeoff bandwidth for increased latency in propagating attestations across the network
